songs.title: Step on Over
songs.album: Dreamgirls: Music from the Motion Picture (Deluxe Edition)
songs.lyrics:
[Deena Jones (The Dreams)]
Step, step
Step on over
(Step on over, step on over)

Step, step
Step on over
(Step on over, step on over)

Wanting you
(Wanting you)
Needing you
(Needing you)
Wanting you
Needing you
Touching you
Loving you
